author: pauljanes
title: Chennai-Andaman ferry and travel itinery
text: # 1 planning my asia trip starting from mumbai sept 30 onwards,approx 12 months (no real time limit as such),really fancy the andaman and nicobar islands along the way,several questions on this if someone can help... 1/ air or ferry and approx cost of each ?, 2/ if by ferry which is the best port to leave from or does it make no difference ?,3/ i dont want a tear through the islands without getting a feel of them and missing certain must see's so whats a realistic amount of time to allow, 4/ what is the visa situation with the islands,is it a seperate issued visa from the india one i know its a lot of questions guys but any help on any or all of the questions would be really appreciated
